summary: A prostitute agrees to get impregnated and then give the baby to a couple (Raj and Priya) in exchange for a million rupees. Everything changes when she develops feelings for the baby and Raj.
cast: Preity Zinta|Salman Khan|Rani Mukerji|Amrish Puri|Dalip Tahil|Farida Jalal|Prem Chopra|Johnny Lever|Ruby Bhatia|Deepti Bhatnagar|Adi Irani|Apara Mehta|Raja Mukherjee|Sheela Sharma
director: Directors: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla, Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla
title: Chori Chori Chupke Chupke
